story: As a User, I want to login with @special#characters$ so that I can access my account.
As a User, I want to save my work so that I don't lose progress. (Note: This should auto-save every 5 minutes)
As a Customer, I want to search for products so that I can find what I need.
As a Writer, I want to format text with bold & italic styles so that I can emphasize content.
As a Manager, I want to export reports so that I can share them offline.
As a care professional, I want to see the registered hours of this week (split into products and activities). See: Mockup from Alice NOTE: - First create the overview screen - Then add validations
